function flusspferd::create_native_function ( object const &  o,
std::string const &  name,
T *  fnptr,
typename boost::enable_if_c< boost::is_function< T >::value >::type *  = 0 
) [inline]

Create a new native method of an object.

Parameters:
o The object to add the method to.
name The method name.
fnptr The function to call (also determines the function signature).
Returns:
The new method.

Create a new native method of an object.

Parameters:

o The object to add the method to.
name The function name.
fn The functor to call.

The new function.

function flusspferd::create_native_function ( object const &  o,
native_function_base *  ptr 
)

Create a new native function as method of an object.

The new method of object o will have the name ptr->name().

Parameters:
o The object to add the method to.
ptr The native function object.
Returns:
The new method.

function flusspferd::create_native_function ( native_function_base *  ptr  ) 

Create a new native function.

ptr will be deleted by Flusspferd.

Parameters:
ptr The native function object.
Returns:
The new function.

template<typename F >
object flusspferd::create_native_functor_function ( object const &  o,
  ... 
) [inline]

Create a new native function of type F as method of an object.

F must inherit from native_function_base.

The new method of object o will have the name ptr->name().

Parameters:
F The functor type.
o The object to add the method to.
... The parameters to pass to the constructor of F.
Returns:
The new method.

template<typename R , typename T >
function flusspferd::create_native_method ( object const &  o,
std::string const &  name,
R T::*  memfnptr 
) [inline]

Create a new native method of an object.

Parameters:
o The object to add the method to.
name The method name.
memfnptr The member function to call (also determines the function signature).
Returns:
The new function.

template<typename T >

void(T::*)(call_context &)  memfnptr,
unsigned  arity = 0

Create a new native method of an object.

memfnptr The member function to call.

template<typename T >
function flusspferd::create_native_method ( object const &  o,
std::string const &  name,
T *  fnptr,
typename boost::enable_if_c< boost::is_function< T >::value >::type *  = 0 
) [inline]

Create a new native method of an object.

The first parameter passed will be 'this'.

Parameters:
o The object to add the method to.
name The method name.
fnptr The function to call (also determines the function signature).
Returns:
The new method.

template<typename T >
function flusspferd::create_native_method ( object const &  o,
std::string const &  name,
boost::function< T > const &  fn 
) [inline]

Create a new native method of an object.

The first parameter passed will be 'this'.

Parameters:
T The function signature to use.
o The object to add the method to.
name The function name.
fn The functor to call.
Returns:
The new function.
